name: bluecontroller
short_description:
A "BlueController" is an ATmega board using an ATMega328P or ATmega88PA microcontroller chip. Instead of a USB serial port, it uses a BTM-222 Bluetooth module which makes it similar to an Arduino-BT.

For more information please read doc/HowToUseBlueControllerWithArduino.pdf 
Features of this project
 * Integration of Bluecontroller in the Arduino environment
  * LED uses PB6 pin instead of PB5
  * Example and configuration sketches to set up the BTM-222 ("Setup_BlueController" in examples/)
  * added device definition and bootloaders so the bootloader can directly be flashed from Arduino IDE
 * ISP programmer with optimized communication speed and adapted avrdude
summary: Arduino IDE integration of the BlueController board (BCA8-BTM)
